ygData.subject: Re: Interesting Benefit of Charismatic Carralion
ygData.msgSnippet: Theoretically he is a spy for Deeppocketssess... Good Journey, Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule) 8)-----Original Message----- 8)From: John Kim
ygData.messageBody:
Theoretically he is a spy for Deeppocketssess...

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----
8)From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
8)Sent: Saturday, June 05, 1999 5:20 AM
8)To: eqbards@onelist.com
8)Subject: Re: [eqbards] Interesting Benefit of Charismatic Carralion
8)
8)
8)From: John Kim <kim@...>
8)
8)On Fri, 4 Jun 1999, Greg Limes wrote:
8)> John Kim wrote:
8)>
8)> > We discussed this on the monk list. Apparently the way it
8)> > works is that each necklace/belt you turn in raises your
8)> > faction, each time you kill Mooto raises your faction, each
8)> > time you kill Gunrich lowers your faction. Once you get
8)> > enough faction, you get the ring.
8)>
8)> Killing Gunrich lowers your faction? ARGH!
8)>
8)> 1) I've been given no hint in the game that Gunrich is anything
8)> but just another named NPC, like Mooto only easier.
8)>
8)> 2) When I kill Gunrich, I get *no* faction adjust messages.
8)
8)That is just what I've heard. If you've actually killed him
8)and gotten no message, then I'm inclined to believe there is
8)no faction loss for killing him.
8)
8)--
8)John H. Kim
8)kim@...
8)
8)
